title: Myra - Claws of the Lioness
description: After her secret internet journal is revealed to the one man who must never see her words, Myra soon finds herself imprisoned in a world of no rights, comfort, or pleasures. Worse still her Master intends to marry; not his devoted slave as she has long dreamed of doing, but the woman of his long burning, childhood desire. The cold and cruel Birgitte. A woman he would do anything to attain......Myraâ€™s tightly controlled, and cloistered world is turned upside down. The simple life she had lived dissolved in the space of a few short weeks. A vast new home, new expectations, and a Mistress to serve. Myra is drawn into the forbidden and secret world of upper class, lavish lifestyle, as her Master struggles to appease his ever hungry wife, with both his body and his wallet. Myra again becomes the girl who is never noticed, or has she?..........Show more Show less
author: Myra Zhivanevskaya
